text: Linda Haglund (15 June 1956 - 21 November 2015) was a Swedish Olympic sprinter. Her running career would take her to the 1972, 1976 and 1980 Summer Olympics. Haglund had her best Olympic Games showing with a fourth place in the Moscow Games' 100 metres final. Haglund died from complications of lung cancer on 21 November 2015, aged 59. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2015 deaths Category:1972 Summer Olympics Category:1976 Summer Olympics Category:1980 Summer Olympics Category:Swedish sprinters Category:Olympians for Sweden
title: Linda Haglund
